data.title: Wikipedia, Njikotá édémédé nke onyobulạ
data.text:
Robert Gant (onye amụrụ Robert John Gonzalez; July 13, 1968) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Ben Bruckner na usoro Showtime Queer as Folk .[1]

Mbido ndụ na agụmakwụkwọ

[dezie | dezie ebe o si]

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, Gant malitere ime ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi telivishọn na Florida wee bụrụ onye otu Screen Actors Guild mgbe ọ dị afọ zomi na otu.[2]

Gant gụrụ egwu tap na jazz na American Musical Theatre Company na Tampa, Florida. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ dị nro na MacDill Air Force Base na onye na-eme ihe ọchị Bob Hope dị ka akụkụ nke njem USO nke Hope. [3]Ọ gara George D. Chamberlain High School ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1986.[4]

Mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum Pennsylvania, Gant gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Shakespeare na abụ. [2]Ọ gara Georgetown University Law Center, ebe ọ nwetara Juris Doctor na 1993. Gant bụkwa onye otu Georgetown Gilbert & Sullivan Society, na-eme ihe n'ọtụtụ mmepụta ya. [5][6]Gant malitere otu mmadụ isii a cappella, The MetroGnomes, nke rụrụ ọrụ na ebe ndị dị gburugburu Washington, D.C.[2]

Gant nakweere ọnọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ Los Angeles nke ụlọ ọrụ iwu mba ụwa Baker McKenzie nke dị na Chicago. Mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechiri ọfịs ya na Los Angeles n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Gant kpebiri ịchụso ime ihe nkiri na ime ihe nkiri.[2]

Site na 2002 ruo 2005, Gant gosipụtara Prọfesọ Ben Bruckner na usoro telivishọn Showtime Queer as Folk . Omume ya lụrụ di na nwunye mbụ iwu kwadoro nke e gosipụtara na telivishọn America.[7]

N'afọ 2004, Gant pụtara na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Billy's Dad is a Fudgepacker, nkwanye ugwu maka ihe nkiri agụmakwụkwọ nke afọ 1950, nke gosipụtara na Sundance Film Festival. [8]N'afọ 2005, Gant bụ usoro a na-eme mgbe niile na ihe nkiri BBC 3-mepụtara Personal Affairs, nke e debere na ngalaba ego nke London ma mee ihe nkiri na London na Scotland. [9]Gant bụ naanị onye America n'ime ndị Briten niile.[7]

Gant bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Mythgarden. Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2007 bụ Save Me, ihe nkiri a na-eme na ndabere nke ozi nwoke na nwoke, kpakpando Gant tinyere Judith Light na Chad Allen ma gosipụta ya na Sundance Film Festival. [7]O sokwa mepụta, dee, ma mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri oge nke Netflix na-ekesa Milada, ezigbo akụkọ nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Czech Milada Horáková, onye gọọmentị Kọmunist gburu na 1950.[7][10][11]

Gant gosipụtara onye nledo mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, Kiss Me Deadly, nke a gbara n'ebe dị na New Zealand. [12][13]Gant gosipụtara nna Kryptonian nke Melissa Benoist bụ Zor-El na Supergirl, Todd Crimsen na usoro Netflix 13 Reasons Why, na Jim Hunter na The Fosters na usoro ya Good Trouble. [7][14][7][15][16][17]Tupu Queer as Folk, Gant laghachiri dị ka Principal Calvin Krupps na usoro telivishọn mbụ nke Ryan Murphy, Popular, na ọrụ ugboro ugboro dị ka enyi nwoke Caroline Trevor na Caroline in the City.[7][18][19][2]

Gant nwere ọrụ ndị ọbịa na ihe ngosi telivishọn Friends, ebe ọ na-eme otu n'ime ụmụ nwoke abụọ Phoebe na-eme mkpapụ n'otu oge. Nwoke nke ọzọ bụ onye Queer na-eme ihe nkiri Folk, Matt Battaglia, na-eme Phoebe. [7][19]Onye ọbịa Gant gosipụtara na Melrose Place, Becker, ọtụtụ ihe ngosi metụtara CSI, Caroline in the City, na Criminal Minds. [13][2][7][18]N'afọ 2013, o gosipụtara Captain Robert Norton na Dead Space 3, nke atọ na usoro Egwuregwu vidio Dead Space nke Electronic Arts wepụtara.[20]

Ndụ onwe onye

[dezie | dezie ebe o si]

N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke magazin The Advocate bipụtara, Gant pụtara dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke n'afọ 2002.[21][22][23]

Gant na-akwado òtù ndị dị ka Services & Advocacy for LGBT Elders (SAGE) na Gay & Lesbian Elder Housing (GLEH).

Akụkụ nke ihe nkiri

[dezie | dezie ebe o si]

Afọ Aha ya Ọrụ Ihe edeturu 1996 Obodo ukwu: Los Angeles Onye uwe ojii B Jane Street Jay 1997 Hercules Ihe nkiri vidio 1999 Ịkụzi Ihe Oriakụ Tingle Prọfesọ Nkwekọrịta ahụ Gene Collins 2002 Mmalite na Mmalite Ian 2004 Marie na Bruce Onye na-ere nri Nna Billy bụ onye na-etinye ihe n'akpa! Nna Billy Dị mkpirikpi 2007 Zọpụta M Scott Onye na-emepụta ihe Na-ebi ndụ! Onye nduzi 2012 Joshua Tree, 1951: Ihe osise nke James Dean Ian 2016 Ịhụnanya Ọ bụ Ihe Nile Ị Chọrọ? Pete Santilli Ịdị gịrịgịrị Vince Davi 2017 Otu Nde Obi Ụtọ Dr. Hansen Milada Bohuslav Horák Onye edemede na onye na-emepụta 2021 Map nke obere ihe zuru oke Onye Na-ahụ Maka Ọnọdụ Ihu igwe Dave

Arthur Goodwin Ihe omume: "Val Cubed" Nkwado Nwoke Na-alụ Nwoke Ihe omume: "Ọ na-ezo ndị ikom" 2002–05 Ndị na-eme ihe ike dị ka ndị mmadụ Prọfesọ Ben Bruckner Ihe omume 55 2005 Ihe dị nso Julian Carver Ihe omume: "Agha" 2006 Pepper Dennis Benny Gold Ihe omume: "Anya A Ma Ama Pụrụ Ịkwụ N'elu" 2007 CSI: Nnyocha nke Ebe Mpụ Lewis Greyburg Ihe omume: "Anya efu" 2008 Nip/Tuck Jeff Morris Ihe omume: "Magda na Jeff" Isusu m ọnụ nke ukwuu Jacob Keane Ihe nkiri telivishọn Nkwado Pụrụ Iche Nate Spencer Ihe nkiri telivishọn 2009 Rick & Steve: Di na Nwunye Na-enwe Obi Ụtọ n'Ụwa Nile Onye isi obodo Mayer Olu; Ihe omume: "Nanị Onye Na-aga n'Otu n'Obodo" CSI: NY Felix Redman Ihe omume: "Green Piece" Ọnọdụ Union nke Tracey Ullman Buzz Ihe omume: "Fuzzy Cheeks" Ihe gbasara onwe onye Rock van Gelder Ihe omume 5 Obí Eze Ron Bigby Ihe omume: "Deep in Death" CSI: Miami Lloyd Arrington Ihe omume: "Onye iro na-eweghara ọchịchị" 2010 Ọkpụkpụ Jason Hendler Ihe omume: "Dentist in the Ditch" Okpomọkụ na Cleveland Steve Ihe omume: "Ụbọchị ọmụmụ" 90210 Dr. Wright Ihe omume: "Jide m ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-agba égbè" 2011 Mike na Molly Kyle Ihe omume: "Ụbọchị Valentine nke Mbụ" Ịgba alụkwaghịm Obi Ụtọ Mark Ihe omume: "A Kiss Is Just a Kiss" Ndụ Nzuzo nke Onye Ntorobịa America Maazị Martin Ihe omume: "4-1-1" Ndụ M Dị ka Nnwale Craig Rolle Ihe nkiri telivishọn 2012 Ndị Nnwere Onwe Mak Ihe omume: "Ụmụaka nwere ike ịdị mma" Enweghị ihere Greg Garvin Ihe omume: "Ụbọchị Nna" 2013 Vegas Rick Kent Ihe omume: "Site n'ụbọchị a gaa n'ihu" NCIS Mike Dunkel Ihe omume: "Detour" Nchịkwa Iwe Dr. Konner Ihe omume: "Charlie na Hot Nerd" Nwa Nna Steve Ihe omume: "Kpọọ" Sean Na-azọpụta Ụwa Ịchụ nta Ihe omume: "Ụbọchị Atụmanya" 2013–17 Ndị Na-eto Eto na Ndị Na-enweghị Nkwụsị David Sherman Ihe omume iri na isii 2014 Ndị Echiche Peter MacKenzie Ihe omume: "The Citadel"Ihe omume: "Sitting Ducks"

Kpatụ Ala Louis Jason Ihe omume: "Full-Court Press" 2015 Uche Ndị Omume Miles Tate Ihe omume: "Lockdown" 2015–16 Supergirl Zor-El Ihe omume 4 2016 K.C. N'okpuru nzuzo Onye isi ala Jackson Cleveland Ihe omume: "Ihe mberede ga-eme" Ihe omume: 'Brainwashed'
